channel.title: static on Genthus
channel.description: Recent content in static on Genthus

item.title: Gear
item.description: PC Intel 12600k Cooler Master Hyper 212 Cooler Gigabyte Z690 UD DDR4 ATX LGA1700 Motherboard Corsair Vengance 32GB (2x16GB) DDR4-3600 Nvidia GTX 1080FE 8GB GPU Corsair RM650x 80+ Gold Power Supply Drawing XP-Pen Artist 24 (2k QHD version) So far this has been a really nice pen display, I think I got it for aroung 600 USD and its been well worth it. If you’re thinking of buying a pen display, I really think you should get a 2k QHD one and definitely look out for the color accuracy.

item.title: Software
item.description: General Computer Utilities OS: Windows 11 Video player: MPV Audio player: Foobar2000 Text Editor: NeoVim Browser: Firefox E-mail Client: Thunderbird Music: Spotify Torrent Client: qBitTorrent VPN: MullvadVPN Password Manager: Bitwarden Drawing Drawing program: Clip Studio Paint Pro Reference gathering: Pinterest, Pexels Reference displaying: PureRef Japanese learning Flashcards: Anki Utilities: Yomitan Textractor PowerToys Text extractor Gaming Android Emulator: LdPlayer

item.title: Website Info
item.description: I made this website after struggling to find a place in the different social media sites, with none being exactly what I wanted so here I am reinventing the wheel. Github repo for the website Tech used in this website HUGO Tailwind 3 Github Pages
